Auto Generated Documentation¶

lib.generate_week_summary_stats(planned, logged, today)[source]¶

For each number of weeks before present day, generate summary statistics for planned and logged training and merge into a single data frame.

lib.get_baseline_mileage(preferences, first_week_days)[source]¶
  1. Novice, no prior training - pre-defined constants
  2. Novice, prior training - prior training levels
  3. Intermediate - prior training levels
lib.get_limit_mileage(preferences)[source]¶
  1. Novice - pre-defined constants
  2. Intermediate, keep same levels - set to previous level
  3. Intermediate, increase level - pre-defined constants
lib.get_race_distance(preferences)[source]¶

Return number of miles of race from preferences

lib.retrieve_summary_stats(planned, today)[source]¶

Read in the planned_training dataframe and retrieve summary statistics (miles per week, days per week) to work from when updated training plans.

lib.weeks_of_plan(preferences)[source]¶

Calculate the number of weeks until the race
